title: ANAPホールディングス、企業向けビットコイン戦略支援「ビットコイン道場」を開始
contentSnippet: ANAPホールディングスが企業のビットコイン活用を支援する継続型プログラム「ANAPビットコイン道場」の提供を開始した。会計や税務などの実務を専門家が包括的にサポートし、参加企業がコミュニティ形式で課題解決に取り組む仕組みを提供する。

title: コンヴァノがビットコイン戦略から本業回帰、AI・ヘルスケア事業に注力へ
contentSnippet: コンヴァノが仮想通貨ビットコインを最大約2万BTC取得する計画を取り下げ、成長中の事業へ軸足を移す。業績予想を上方修正しており本業成長を重視する戦略転換となる。

title: Bitcoin Greed & Fear Index Shows Extreme Pessimism, Tactical Bottom May Be Near: Analyst
contentSnippet: Peak fear suggests a tactical low may be near.

title: Sovereign Bitcoin adoption would be the ultimate upside catalyst: Jeff Park
contentSnippet: The catalyst could serve as a wake-up call and send Bitcoin to $150,000 overnight, though it “would have to be real," according to Jeff Park.

title: 米当局がビットメイン製品を国家安全保障リスクで調査、トランプ関連企業も1万6000台使用
contentSnippet: 米国土安全保障省が中国メーカーのビットメインを調査し、機器がスパイ活動や電力網破壊に使用される可能性を指摘。トランプ大統領の息子たちの会社アメリカン・ビットコインも1万6000台を購入した。

title: コインベース、ソラナのミームコイン取引所「ベクター」を買収
contentSnippet: コインベースがソラナ基盤SocialFiプラットフォーム「ベクター・ファン」を買収すると発表した。年内に取引完了予定で、ソラナエコシステムへの参入を拡大し、すべてを取引できる取引所の構築を目指す。

title: ベセント米財務長官、ビットコインバーにサプライズ訪問　仮想通貨業界への影響は
contentSnippet: スコット・ベセント米財務長官がビットコインバー「Pubkey DC」を訪問し、仮想通貨コミュニティで話題になっている。業界関係者の反応と今後の影響を解説する。

title: Bitcoiners perk up as odds of a December Fed rate cut almost double
contentSnippet: Some Bitcoiners are speculating that the significant surge in the odds of a Fed rate cut in December may lead to Bitcoin finding a price “bottom here for now.”

title: Cardano Network Disrupted by 'Poisoned' Transaction Attack
contentSnippet: A validation mismatch sparked an unexpected Cardano network fork as a user publicly apologized for sending the bad transaction.

title: NYSEがグレースケールのXRPとドージコインETF承認、25日上場予定
contentSnippet: NYSEがグレースケールのドージコインとXRP ETFの上場を承認し、11月25日に取引を開始する。今週はビットワイズのXRP ETFやフィデリティのソラナETFも上場し、アルトコインETF市場が急拡大している。

title: Solo Bitcoin Miner Hits the Jackpot, Winning $266K BTC Reward
contentSnippet: A solo miner earned a Bitcoin bounty for mining the network’s 924,569th block, securing $266,000 worth of the asset against incredible odds.

title: 「仮想通貨財務企業などの上場後の事業の大幅変更について対応を考える必要」JPXのCEOが指摘＝日経
contentSnippet: 日本取引所グループの山道CEOは、ビットコインなどを保有する仮想通貨財務企業への規制強化は現時点では検討していないと説明。一方で、事業の大幅変更については対応を考える必要があるとも述べている。

title: 個人マイナーがビットコイン採掘に成功、1億8000万分の1の確率を克服
contentSnippet: 極めて小規模な個人マイナーがわずか6TH/sのパワーでビットコインブロックの採掘に成功し、約26万5000ドル相当を獲得した。確率は1億8000万分の1で、近年最も幸運なソロ採掘となった。

title: ‘Rich Dad, Poor Dad’ author and Bitcoin bull Robert Kiyosaki sells his BTC
contentSnippet: Kiyosaki disclosed that he sold his Bitcoin at $90,000 after he forecast a $250,000 price target for BTC in 2026 earlier in November.

title: ETH price drops to 4-month low, but Ether futures data hints at $3.2K bounce
contentSnippet: ETH price fell to levels not seen since July, but compelling futures data could shed light on a silver lining. Is Ether headed toward $3,200?

title: トム・リー率いるビットマイン、初の配当実施もイーサリアム保有の含み損は6250億円超
contentSnippet: イーサリアム最大の企業保有者ビットマイン・イマージョン・テクノロジーズが11月21日、2025年8月期通期で純利益3億2816万ドルを計上し、大手仮想通貨企業として初めて配当を実施すると発表した。しかしイーサリアム価格下落で含み損は40億ドル超に達している。

title: Crypto Industry Makes Tax Policy Push With Private Dinner for Lawmakers
contentSnippet: A powerful nonprofit hosted a dinner with lawmakers this week focused on crypto taxes, while groups backing the nonprofit pushed the Trump administration on related policies.

title: 金持ち父さん著者キヨサキ、3.5億円分ビットコインを売却し広告事業投資へ　以前の姿勢から一転
contentSnippet: 『金持ち父さん貧乏父さん』の著者ロバート・キヨサキ氏が11月22日、約225万ドル相当のビットコインを売却し、外科センターと看板広告事業に投資すると発表した。以前の「売らずに買い続ける」発言から一転した。

title: How low can XRP price go after falling under $2?
contentSnippet: XRP price crumples toward new lows as Bitcoin and ETH liquidations surge. Is the altcoin’s next stop $0.88?

title: Bitcoin in a Death Cross: How Low Will We Go?
contentSnippet: Bitcoin is falling, dragging nearly every other crypto asset along with it. The charts suggest this could get uglier.

title: Coinbase ’doubles down’ on Solana with latest DEX acquisition
contentSnippet: The crypto exchange purchased Vector for an undisclosed amount, the latest acquisition by Coinbase in 2025 after Deribit, Echo and others.

title: BTC ETF outflows are 'tactical rebalancing,' not institutional flight: Analysts
contentSnippet: The outflows reflect short-term price movements, not lower institutional demand or structural issues in the Bitcoin market, analysts said.

title: Bitcoin’s death cross confirmation may mean BTC is officially in a bear market
contentSnippet: A rare death cross has been confirmed on Bitcoin’s price chart, suggesting that the bear market has just started. Will dip buyers be able to defy the trend?

title: Anchorage Digital adds HYPE staking support through Figment partnership
contentSnippet: The integration gives institutions regulated access to HYPE staking on HyperCORE, extending Anchorage Digital’s custody and DeFi capabilities across Hyperliquid.

title: Strategy's $55 Billion Bitcoin Bet Undeterred by Index Delisting Concerns, Says Michael Saylor
contentSnippet: The company’s shares have plunged 43% over the past month.

title: Here’s what happened in crypto today
contentSnippet: Need to know what happened in crypto today? Here is the latest news on daily trends and events impacting Bitcoin price, blockchain, DeFi, NFTs, Web3 and crypto regulation.

title: Grayscale's DOGE, XRP ETFs to Go Live on NYSE Monday
contentSnippet: Rival crypto asset manager Bitwise launched its XRP ETF earlier this week.

title: ICP Breaks Major Support as Volume Spike Confirms Accelerated Downtrend
contentSnippet: A steep selloff pushed ICP below the $4.33 floor, with exceptional volume marking the session’s decisive breakdown.

title: Cathie Wood Buys the Dip as Ark Invest Loads Up on Coinbase, BitMine and Circle Stock
contentSnippet: Cathie Wood's investment firm continues to buy the dip on crypto related equities, adding shares in Coinbase, BitMine, and Circle.

title: BitMine Immersion Sitting on $4B Loss on Ether Bet as Analyst Warns of Structural issues
contentSnippet: Tom Lee's company could trap shareholders amid low staking yields, hefty embedded fees and vanishing NAV premium, 10x Research founder Markus Thielen warns.

title: Nvidia's Stellar Quarter Fails to Quell Bears as AI Valuation Fears Deepen on Wall Street
contentSnippet: The chipmaker’s blockbuster earnings offered a brief reprieve, but a rapid reversal in trading cemented investor worries about the sustainability of the AI boom.

title: UK Operation to Hit Russian Sanctions Evasion Arrests 128, Seizes $32.6M in Crypto and Cash
contentSnippet: Operation Destabilise has established that one money laundering network operating in the UK was involved in buying a bank in Kyrgyzstan.

title: Japanese Bitcoin Treasury Firms Keep Beating BTC. Tax Policy Makes Outperforming U.S. Peers the Easy Part
contentSnippet: While U.S.-listed bitcoin treasury firms struggle to outperform ETFs, Japan’s harsh crypto tax code sends investors into DAT stocks, making outperformance easy.

title: HBAR Crashes 11.5% Breaking Below Key Support Levels
contentSnippet: Trading volume explodes 98% above average as institutional sellers drive Hedera token through critical technical barriers.

title: BitMine Shares Tumble After Earnings as Ethereum Price Falls, Treasury Hype Fades
contentSnippet: The company is valued at a discount to its Ethereum holdings

title: Borrowing Against Your Tesla Stock to Buy a Car Is the Future of DeFi: Robert Leshner
contentSnippet: Tokenizing stocks and physical assets could let investors self-custody, borrow in DeFi, and easily transfer ownership, says Superstate CEO.

title: Michael Saylor Speaks Out Again as MSCI Concerns Mount
contentSnippet: JPMorgan warning on potential MSCI exclusion sparks fresh pressure, prompting another public response from the executive chairman.

title: U.S. House Bill Would Allow Federal Taxes in BTC While Aiding U.S. Reserve
contentSnippet: Rep. Warren Davidson introduced legislation that allows bitcoin tax payments without incurring capital gains to beef up the U.S. Strategic Bitcoin Reserve.

title: Fanatics Enters Prediction Markets via Crypto.com Partnership
contentSnippet: The product is set to launch in the next couple weeks, Fanatics CEO Michael Rubin said on CNBC.

title: Coinbase to Snap Up Solana-Based DEX Vector as Acquisition Spree Continues
contentSnippet: The exchange’s latest deal folds Solana-native Vector into its consumer trading arm, extending a rapid M&A streak.
